attributes.action: Teach all secondary students about the impact of climate change & solutions.
attributes.background: We would like the government to make it compulsory for secondary schools to teach students about the environment so that as a nation, the next generation will help achieve the UN net zero 2050 goal. We need to educate people about climate change otherwise we all know that there won't be an impact!

rejection.details: Sustainability and climate change is already part of the National Curriculum, which you can read more about curriculum content on sustainability and climate change here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cdp-2021-0166/
